name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 190°C (375°F).
Cream butter and sugars, then add eggs and vanilla.
Mix in flour and chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Sauté onions and carrots until soft.
Brown the ground beef in a pan.
Add tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve sauce over pasta.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Dice cucumbers and tomatoes.
Cut feta into cubes.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Toss gently and serve.

name: Banana Bread
instructions: Mash bananas in a bowl.
Mix flour, sugar, and melted butter.
Fold in bananas and walnuts.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 50 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a wok or pan.
Stir-fry vegetables for 5 minutes.
Add tofu and soy sauce.
Cook for another 3 minutes and serve.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in milk and eggs.
Melt butter and add to batter.
Cook on a greased pan until bubbles form.
Flip and cook for another minute.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Brown chicken in a pan and set aside.
Sauté onions until translucent.
Add curry paste and cook for 1 minute.
Return chicken to pan, add coconut milk and potatoes.
Simmer for 25 minutes until chicken is cooked through.

name: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk and salt.
Melt butter in a non-stick pan.
Pour egg mixture into pan.
Add cheese and mushrooms when eggs begin to set.
Fold omelette in half and garnish with chives.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm taco shells according to package.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, and cheese.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: Peel and slice apples, mix with sugar and cinnamon.
Line pie dish with bottom crust.
Add apple mixture and dot with butter.
Cover with top crust and seal edges.
Bake at 200°C (400°F) for 45 minutes.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Sauté onions, carrots, and zucchini in olive oil.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth, bring to boil.
Add pasta and cook until al dente.
Season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Serve with grated parmesan.

name: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Deglaze pan with white wine.
Toss with pasta and garnish with parsley.

name: Beef Burger
instructions: Form ground beef into patties.
Grill or fry patties to desired doneness.
Toast burger buns lightly.
Assemble burgers with cheese, lettuce, and pickles.
Serve with ketchup and mustard.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté mushrooms in butter and set aside.
Toast rice in the same pan.
Add wine and cook until absorbed.
Gradually add hot stock while stirring.
Stir in mushrooms and parmesan before serving.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Toss lettuce with dressing.
Add croutons and anchovies.
Shave parmesan over the top.
Serve immediately.

name: Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Melt chocolate and butter together.
Whip cream with sugar and vanilla.
Fold melted chocolate into whipped cream.
Chill for at least 4 hours.
Serve with berries if desired.

name: Ratatouille
instructions: Slice all vegetables uniformly.
Sauté onions and garlic in olive oil.
Layer vegetables in a baking dish.
Pour tomatoes over the top.
Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 45 minutes.

name: French Onion Soup
instructions: Caramelize onions slowly in butter.
Add beef broth and simmer for 20 minutes.
Toast baguette slices.
Ladle soup into bowls, top with bread and cheese.
Broil until cheese is bubbly and golden.

name: Blueberry Muffins
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk wet ingredients separately.
Combine wet and dry ingredients gently.
Fold in blueberries.
Bake at 190°C (375°F) for 20-25 minutes.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Poach chicken in broth until cooked.
Remove chicken and shred.
Add vegetables to broth and simmer.
Cook noodles separately.
Combine all ingredients and season to taste.

name: Tiramisu
instructions: Dip ladyfingers briefly in cooled espresso.
Layer in a dish with mascarpone mixture.
Repeat layers, ending with mascarpone.
Dust with cocoa powder.
Chill for at least 6 hours before serving.

name: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef in batches and set aside.
Sauté onions and garlic.
Add flour to make a roux.
Return beef to pot, add vegetables and stock.
Simmer for 2 hours until meat is tender.
